original_text: While all the Israelite people stood there, the king turned round towards them. He prayed that God would bless them.
korean_text: 얼굴을 돌려 이스라엘 온 회중을 위하여 축복하니 그 때에 이스라엘의 온 회중이 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: While all the Israelite people stood there
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 이스라엘 백성이 그곳에 서 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: the king turned round towards them
He prayed that God would bless them
